segments.description: A wide shot of a mountain biking trail during sunset, showcasing a group of young adults gearing up for their ride. The camera pans to a close-up of one rider grabbing a can of the energy drink, ready to take on the challenge.
segments.visualPrompt: Wide shot of a mountain biking trail at sunset. Young adults prepare for their ride, with vibrant colors in the sky. The camera smoothly pans in to a close-up of a rider holding a can of the energy drink, with excitement in their eyes. Soft natural light enhances the scene, creating an invigorating atmosphere.
visualPromptAlternatives: Close-up of the rider's face, showcasing determination as they crack open the can of energy drink. Background features the mountain trail fading into a blur.
Dynamic shot from a drone, capturing the group of riders on the trail. The camera zooms in on the energy drink can as it shines in the sunlight.
A handheld shot of the riders laughing and high-fiving, with one holding the energy drink can prominently in the foreground, vibrant lighting emphasizing the fun.
segments.audioNotes: Music: Upbeat electronic music. Voiceover: 'Are you ready to unleash your potential?'

segments.description: As the action progresses, the riders embark on their adventure, speeding down the trail with exhilarating jumps and stunts. Quick cuts showcase the energy drink being consumed, fueling their performance.
segments.visualPrompt: Fast-paced montage of the riders racing down the trail, executing jumps and tricks. The camera alternates between close-ups of the riders, wide shots of the landscape, and shots of them sipping the energy drink mid-ride. The lighting is bright and dynamic, capturing the thrill of the moment.
visualPromptAlternatives: Slow-motion shot of a rider performing a jump while holding the energy drink can, the background blurring to emphasize the action.
Over-the-shoulder shot of a rider looking down at the trail ahead, with the energy drink can visible in their backpack.
Split-screen showing different riders performing stunts, each with a close-up of them drinking the energy drink to highlight its energizing effects.
segments.audioNotes: Music: High-energy instrumental music builds intensity. Voiceover: 'Boost your performance and fuel your adventure!'

segments.description: The riders finish their exhilarating ride, laughing and celebrating. The camera zooms in on the energy drink can as the screen fades to the product logo with a call to action.
segments.visualPrompt: The group of riders comes to a stop at a scenic viewpoint, high-fiving and laughing. The camera zooms in on the energy drink can resting on a rock, with the product logo clearly visible. The background is a stunning mountain landscape, inspiring adventure. The lighting is warm and inviting, creating a sense of accomplishment.
visualPromptAlternatives: Close-up of the energy drink can being lifted in celebration by one of the riders, with the backdrop of the mountains.
Wide shot of the group standing together, raising their cans of energy drink towards the camera, with smiles on their faces.
A dynamic shot where the camera spins around the group as they cheer, ending with a close-up of the energy drink can and the product logo.
segments.audioNotes: Music: Climactic finish of the instrumental music. Voiceover: 'Try it now and feel the rush!'
